1602050.name: Wild Jigsaw VR
1602050.description: Two young gods: Una, a girl who is in charge of ruling over life, plants, the sun and everything that grows, and Anu, a boy who rules over the destructive side of nature like storms, volcanoes, tornadoes... They decided to take over the new world. While Anu was flaunting his power, Una was quietly creating the world, and after she filled the planet with lush, green islands and beautiful landscapes, she decided to create its inhabitants. She moulded various animals out of clay and left them in the sun to dry and mature so that she could give them a breath of life.While she was resting the mischievous Anu, out of jealousy, broke the clay figures into small pieces. Now Una must put the fragments together to give each land its inhabitants.
1602050.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 繁体中文, 简体中文, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语
